data.title: Emmy Rossum
data.text:
AKA Emmanuelle Grey Rossum

Born: 12-Sep-1986

Birthplace: New York City

Gender: Female

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Day After Tomorrow

Father: (banker)

Mother: (photographer)

Boyfriend: David Wildenstein (French heir, 2004 to Nov-2005)

Husband: Justin Siegel (music producer, m. 2008, separated 2009, div.28-Dec-2011)

Boyfriend: Adam Duritz (musician, together 2010)

Engagement: Sam Esmail (engaged 2015)

High School: Spence School, New York City, NY

University: Columbia University (enrolled 2004)

Irish Ancestry Maternal

Scottish Ancestry Maternal

Dutch Ancestry Paternal

Jewish Ancestry Paternal
